http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif MASS-DIGITIZATION List MASS-DIGITIZATION List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=MASS-DIGITIZATION&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=MASS-DIGITIZATION.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-06-25T09:35:30Z Melissa Terras 2014-06-25T11:25:06+01:00 2014-06-25T11:25:06+01:00 Survey on Budget and Costing of Digitization Projects https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MASS-DIGITIZATION;14f55396.1406 Dear Mass Digitization List,<br><br>I'm undertaking some research into how Heritage organisations budget and<br>plan digitization projects, and in particular, I'm looking for insights and<br>guidance on areas people tend to under-cost, or aspects of projects that<br>institutions should pay particular attention to when putting project plans<br>together.<br><br>I've put together a short survey to collect any advice you would have for<br>those about to plan and budget digitization projects, and I would<br>appreciate any input you had: https://opinio.ucl.ac.uk/s?s=31273 [...]
